title: WTF is Zed's 99% banrate.
body:
For the past 8 games or so Zed has been banned. It's like the first thought that every player in the whole goddamn game has when banning is to go for zed? Why? 

ZED ISNT THAT GOOD ANYMORE!

replies.body: Don't worry Rengar will take that spot soon enough.
There's no explaining what goes on in bronze...

> [{quoted}](name=Lucifir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cTMLn79V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-20T20:03:24.130+0000)
>
> There's no explaining what goes on in bronze...

Exactly why i wont be playing ranked this season.
you could try getting a higher rank where players actually know that Zed isn't good
I don't understand low elo bans, but when i smurf i always ban Yi. Zeds like the last thing i would expect to actually work in bronze xD

> [{quoted}](name=Its Meta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cTMLn79V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-20T20:04:52.210+0000)
>
> I don't understand low elo bans, but when i smurf i always ban Yi. Zeds like the last thing i would expect to actually work in bronze xD

yi sucks

Not in silver 1 and low gold. He's freelo down there like no other champion. Yi, Tryndamere, Jax, Xin, all the point and click melee heros are so damn easy for you guys to play. Add Wukong, Amumu, Malphite to that list too.
I climbed from bronze -> gold with primarily Amumu/Darius...I'm a terrible person :^)
hehe. Get to diamond with something like Kayle, then you can be an ultimate nooblorde :^) (Like me haha)
the legend :^)
He's not fun to play against

> [{quoted}](name=yerteenagedream,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cTMLn79V,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-20T20:08:25.741+0000)
>
> He's not fun to play against

47% winrate is terrible. You must really suck at mid lane.

> [{quoted}](name=xXUkarozXx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cTMLn79V,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-11-20T20:12:51.058+0000)
>
> 47% winrate is terrible. You must really suck at mid lane.

you should probably re-read his comment before you make a fool of yourself by immaturely insulting others for no reason (especially considering how your insult wasn't even relevant to the topic)

on a related note: Might I suggest treating people kinder? I know you have the whole "I'm anonymous on the internet" thing going on but that doesn't make it ok to lash out at people for having a different opinion than you

> [{quoted}](name=Slythion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cTMLn79V,comment-id=000400000002,timestamp=2016-11-20T21:43:33.964+0000)

> on a related note: Might I suggest treating people kinder? I know you have the whole "I'm anonymous on the internet" thing going on but that doesn't make it ok to lash out at people for having a different opinion than you

Amen
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

> on a related note: Might I suggest treating people kinder? I know you have the whole "I'm anonymous on the internet" thing going on but that doesn't make it ok to lash out at people for having a different opinion than you

amen

> [{quoted}](name=xXUkarozXx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cTMLn79V,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-11-20T20:12:51.058+0000)
>
> 47% winrate is terrible. You must really suck at mid lane.

???
Not sure if you noticed, but he said fun.  Win rate has no effect on fun.

I ban Zed whenever I play mid, not so much because I can't play against him---he's certainly not the worst, but I don't trust my team to listen to pings/alerts to let them know that he is roaming.  Sure, I shut him down in mid, but he just roams bot and gets a double kill.  

I hate that his ult has no counterplay if you're not a mage building Zhonyas, but otherwise I personally don't mind him.  

Ekko is a far better ban really, since no matter what, tank Ekko will always be a problem---particularly with the new masteries.
I hate him and ban him whenever I mid. Especially if i  play veigar
Update: just got in another game and zed was banned.
